articles.title: Alex Rodriguez slides into single life with bikini-clad women as Jennifer Lopez is coupled up with Ben Affleck - Fox News
articles.description: Alex Rodriguez was caught enjoying single life while on a European yacht trip for his 46th birthday. The former Yankees star was spotted surrounded by women in bikinis Friday.
articles.content:

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: EU has shipped tiny percentage of planned COVID-19 shot donations - Rappler
articles.description: As of July 13, European Union countries have donated less than four million shots, an internal document compiled by the European Commission and reviewed by Reuters shows
articles.content: However it has so far delivered only about 800,000 doses, half of which went to its former colonies Senegal, Mauritania, and Burkina Faso, the document shows.
